Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3824 affecting package php for versions less than 8.2.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-3824 affecting package php for versions less than 8.2.8-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package php is earlier than 8.2.8-1, affected by CVE-2023-3824
